alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Inland Charlotte (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 11:39PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Charlotte County through 1215 AM EDT... At 1139 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Port Charlotte, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Punta Gorda, Port Charlotte, Charlotte County Airport, Murdock, Gulf Cove, Tropical Gulf Acres, El Jobean, Harbour Heights, Charlotte Park, Cleveland, Solana, Charlotte Harbor, and Rotonda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
